verses.verse: The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is like <S%G3666>unto<s%> a <S%G444>certain<s%> <S%G935>king<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G1062>marriage<s%> <S%G5207>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> sent <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> them that were <S%G2564>invited<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1062>wedding<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>.

<S%G3825>Again<s%>, he sent <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2036>Tell<s%> them which are <S%G2564>invited<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, I have <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G712>dinner<s%>: <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5022>oxen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> my <S%G4619>fatlings<s%> are <S%G2380>killed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2092>ready<s%>: <S%G1205>come<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1062>marriage<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> they made light <S%G272>of<s%> <S%G565>it<s%>, and went their ways, <S%G3588%G99999>one<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2398>his<s%> <S%G68>farm<s%>, <S%G3588%G99999>another<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1711>merchandise<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G191>when<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3710>this<s%>, he was angry: <S%G2532>and<s%> he sent <S%G3992>forth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4753>armies<s%>, and <S%G622>destroyed<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G5406>murderers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> burned <S%G1714>up<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>.

<S%G2532>So<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3598>highways<s%>, and gathered <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%>, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4190>bad<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1062>wedding<s%> was <S%G4130>furnished<s%> with <S%G345>guests<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1525>when<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> came <S%G1525>in<s%> to <S%G2300>see<s%> the <S%G345>guests<s%>, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G1746>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> a <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1742>garment<s%>:

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> to the <S%G1249>servants<s%>, <S%G1210>Bind<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%>, and <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G142>away<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%>; <S%G1563>there<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2805>weeping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they sent <S%G649>out<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G2265>Herodians<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>, we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2532>truth<s%>, <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G3199>care<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G3762>any<s%> <S%G1063>man<s%>: for you <S%G991>regard<s%> <S%G3756%G99999>not<s%> the <S%G4383>person<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>.

They <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2541>Cæsar<s%>'s. <S%G5119>Then<s%> says <S%G3004>he<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G591>Render<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G2541>Cæsar<s%> the things which are <S%G2541>Cæsar<s%>'s; <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> the things that are <S%G2316>God<s%>'s.
<S%G2532>When<s%> they had <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G2296>words<s%>, they marveled, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and went their <S%G565>way<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%>, when he had married a <S%G1060>wife<s%>, <S%G5053>deceased<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4690>issue<s%>, <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G80>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>:

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>, You do <S%G4105>err<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%>, <S%G3366>nor<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G1060>they<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1060>marry<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> are given in <S%G1547>marriage<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> as <S%G4012>touching<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, have <S%G314>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> that which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob<s%>? <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G191>when<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had <S%G5392>put<s%> the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> to <S%G5392>silence<s%>, they were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G846>together<s%>.

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, which was a <S%G3544>lawyer<s%>, <S%G1905>asked<s%> him a <S%G3985>question<s%>, tempting <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? <S%G5101>Whose<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> is <S%G2076>he<s%>? They <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, The Son of <S%G1138>David<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G611>answer<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G5111>dared<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G575>forth<s%> <S%G1905>ask<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> any more <S%G3765>questions<s%>.
